fields.description:
Currently {{ItemTemplate}} elements work only inside a {{Templates}} element inside a {{ListView}}.

It would be great to being able to use them standalone, given that there are ore than one library out there which requires ItemTemplates-like format. See:

- https://github.com/FokkeZB/css-layout-ti
- https://github.com/smclab/power-templates
- https://github.com/appersonlabs/Carbon
